metrics.name: RoslynDepthOfInheritance
metrics.description: Avoid excessive inheritance. CA1501 only applies to types.

Type.notes: Threshold level 5 or 6 is MS Advice.

Assembly.notes: Assembly complexity naturally accumulates; number has no reason here.

Type.notes: For Types there should be other metrics like CC/LOC or IQR of CC. 100 and 120 are informational only.

Member.notes: MS says 10 is good for projects with advantages, 15 good for others.

metrics.name: RoslynMaintainabilityIndex
metrics.description: Maintain high maintainability index scores. 0-9: Red (low), 10-19: Yellow (moderate), 20-100: Green (good)

Assembly.notes: Here and below numbers are MS Advice above + observation of current codebase that has almost all symbols MI>50.

metrics.name: RoslynClassCoupling
metrics.description: Keep dependencies per artifact low to reduce coupling.

Type.notes: AI Advice was to rely on what you are coding: from 15 for core business service to 50 for adapter/facades/configurations.

metrics.name: OpenCoverSequenceCoverage
metrics.description: OpenCover sequence coverage ratio across all symbols.

Type.notes: for type is almost not informative.

Member.notes: Google has SC 60 as acceptable, 75 as commendable, 90 as exemplary.

metrics.name: OpenCoverBranchCoverage
metrics.description: OpenCover branch coverage ratio across all symbols.

Member.notes: Same rules as for Sequence Coverage.

Type.notes: For Types there should be other metrics like CC/LOC or IQR of CC. 100 and 120 are informational only.

Member.notes: MS says 10 is good for projects with advantages, 15 good for others.

metrics.name: OpenCoverNPathComplexity
metrics.description: OpenCover-reported NPath complexity. Only applies to members in OpenCover now.

Member.notes: Historical threshold for NPath on Earth is 200

metrics.name: RoslynSourceLines
metrics.description: Roslyn source lines metric. Uses for informational purposes only.

metrics.name: RoslynExecutableLines
metrics.description: Roslyn executable lines metric. Thresholds are chosen as a average of common suggestions.

metrics.name: SarifCaRuleViolations
metrics.description: SARIF CA rule violations count. Threshold chosen to attract attention where there is something to fix.

Member.notes: Consider CA rules more strict than IDE rules.

metrics.name: SarifIdeRuleViolations
metrics.description: SARIF IDE rule violations count. Threshold chosen to attract attention where there is something to fix.

Member.notes: Consider IDE rules less strict than CA rules.
